title: Riot could you help me out?
body: I had 3700 IP and I bought 2 Hextech Mystery Champin Shards and I am asking if that could be undone!I am I get my IP back and I loose that champion shards! Ty

replies.body: Thanks I don't have any more questions!

Unfortunately, Hextech Crafting content is not eligible for refunds with your refund tokens, as listed in our [refund policy.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ.)

Let me know if you have any questions.
